TopicTitle: Noob Question: How to post pictures/downloads?

Articles.Content: Hello I am a noob so please excuse me. I have no clue on how to post pictures or create a download, can anyone help? (Screw my stupidity)

With the great forum nuking last month, the boards currently do not have attachment functionality. You'll have to put your materials on another site and link them in on the forums here. A lot of folks are using dropbox and imgur.

The attachment functionality has been broken for at least five months, the crash wasn't the cause of it.

So yes, you need to host the file elsewhere. Once you've done that either post the link directly for a file or use either side of it to display the image.

imgur seems to be a winner. Dropbox does occasionally have hiccups.

G.

With the great forum nuking last month, the boards currently do not have attachment functionality. You'll have to put your materials on another site and link them in on the forums here. A lot of folks are using dropbox and imgur.

Ok thanks!
